mil5.3.9:2.2: Taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:3.1: Tatrime cattāro dhammā khanti appāhāratā rativippahānaṁ ākiñcaññaṁ.
mil5.3.9:3.3: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hoti, tena hi ‘catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṁ, taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.9:3.4: Yadi catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūto samaṇo hoti, tena hi ‘āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hotī’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā, ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.9:4.3: ‘catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṁ, taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:4.4: Tadidaṁ, mahārāja, vacanaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ puggalānaṁ guṇavasena bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.3.9:4.5: ‘catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṁ, taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti, idaṁ pana niravasesavacanaṁ ‘āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hotī’ti.
mil5.3.9:5.1: Api ca, mahārāja, ye keci kilesūpasamāya paṭipannā, te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyati.
mil5.3.9:5.2: Yathā, mahārāja, yāni kānici jalajathalajapupphāni, vassikaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati, avasesāni yāni kānici vividhāni pupphajātāni, sabbāni tāni pupphāniyeva, upādāyupādāya pana vassikaṁyeva pupphaṁ janassa patthitaṁ pihayitaṁ;
mil5.3.9:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci kilesūpasamāya paṭipannā, te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyati.
mil5.3.9:6.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, sabbadhaññānaṁ sāli aggamakkhāyati, yā kāci avasesā vividhā dhaññajātiyo, tā sabbā upādāyupādāya bhojanāni sarīrayāpanāya, sāliyeva tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
mil5.3.9:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci kilesūpasamāya paṭipannā, te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
